channel.title: From files to a jar?
channel.description: I got my client ready and I know how to get it into a jar but what do I need to put in it? Cause if I do all files in it runclient gets an error. Atm I can only run it from the map where are the client's files are.... And I want to get it public for my server :) P.S. If this is the wrong section please tell me with is the right section to post this. Thanks, War-Torsten4.

item.title: From files to a jar?
item.dc:creator: @remove_later remove_later
item.description:
@remove_later wrote:

Manifest.txt

Main-Class: client
jar cfm Client.jar Manifest.txt *.class

Read full topic

item.title: From files to a jar?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

make a MAINIFEST file inside it write

Manifest-Version: 1.0
Created-By: 1.6.0 (Sun Microsystems Inc.)
Main-Class: mudclient

save it as MAINIFEST without any extenstion

make a batch command

jar cvfm RS.jar MANIFEST .

that should be do it.

Read full topic
